name: Fairy Battle
description:
Battle as fairies against each other!

1vs1 game, where 2 players take turns playing against each other.

There is Two playable fairies:

the Heart fairy

 and the Star Fairy.

There is Two other non-playable fairies, the Healing fairies (Green fairies). If you kill them they provide your character with a certain amount of healing.

The tree in the middle is magic, when it lights up, it means that the special ability is ready to be used, fire on it to activate it!
